info.narration: #0 is on their way to $0’s Containment Unit to begin the work process.

collection.name: We Can Change Anything
collection.openText: Now everything will be just fine.

specialTipSize.specialTip: Placing an employee inside the machine will produce energy over time.
Once the employee is inside the machine, they will take RED damage. They will be unable to leave and will eventually die.
The amount of energy produced will increase as time goes by.
This Abnormality is not affected by Qliphoth Meltdowns.
